entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of snow beginning this morning then changing to rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy or ice pellets changing to snow before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
